name: DON'T TOUCH IT! (Big Roy)
description:
Prototype  for a game about not pressing a very important button.

Before you is a red button. You know not what it does, but you know that by pressing it untold trauma of unimaginable magnitude will ensue. Will you fulfill your duty to keep this button untouched? Or will you sate your own selfish curiosity?

CREDITS:

Trent Baker (Poki#1308)

Soondae (soondae#0001)

gps (DariusKnight#6549)

Eragon (Eragon263#8067)

Mug/pen models by Adam Capone
